org.dotplot.ui.monitor
Interface MonitorablePlotUnit

All Known Implementing Classes:
FMatrixManager, ModuleSim, QImage
public interface MonitorablePlotUnit

MonitorablePlotUnit must be implemented by anyone who wants to give information about progress.

Author:
Sascha Hemminger

Method Summary

          user cancelled progress unit should immediately stop working!
